https://tmrev.io/movie/27447-Edge of Madness 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/jWjBqF4Sqz2gd1tqITF2V5Lv4K8.jpg 1851, Manitoba's Red River Valley. As winter sets in, a young woman on the edge of madness arrives exhausted at the fort, a wilderness station, claiming she murdered her husband. She's placed in a cell; for the next several months, she sews while the local prefect, Henry Mullen, investigates. Edge of Madness
